reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Supporting core hospitalization services for Palestine refugee children in Lebanon

description.narrative: L'iniziativa in esame nasce dall'esigenza di assicurre ai rifugiati palestinesi in Libano un adeguato accesso alle cure mediche e sanitarie al fine di garantire un miglioramento generale delle loro condizioni di vita

The intervention aims to support the hospitalization costs of all Palestine refugees children below four years old. The contribution of EUR 1.5 milion will allow UNRWA to cover the 2018 hospitalization costs of interventions for 7,050 Palestine refugees children below four years old. The project foresees also the production of a documentary film with the aim of increasing awareness on the vital UNRWA hospitalization services
